title: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
notes: Everything works appears to work as if it were native. Rock solid framerate, x360 controller connected flawlessly. Error message states online features are not available. Steam Cloud saves carried across perfectly but didn't play long enough to see if saves carried back over to Windows. Would not run previously under default or 3.7-4 Beta Proton, game would launch and close almost immediately with no error message.

title: METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN

notes: Not exactly platinum... There appears to be a major issue where if you're trying to play with keyboard & mouse (no controller connected) it would default to the controller scheme leaving your camera in an uncontrollable spin. Actually plugging a gamepad  in can stop this and allow you to use KB/M normally. This is actually a bug on windows that disabling HID devices in device manager can fix however unsure how to fix it within proton.

title: METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN

notes:
Bad HDR when using old NVIDIA drivers. Update to newest drivers to return lighting to normal.

Game will fail to boot after first install. Launch Steam from the terminal to get the game to boot. If you installed with Steam launched from the terminal, launch outside of the terminal.

Save data corrupted for me after 20 hours when Africa was unlocked. Backup your save data regularly, and buyer beware.

Performance is excellent and can get consistent 60FPS with all settings maxed out at full 1080p. Tabbing out of the game may arbitrarily lead to a choppy framerate when you tab back in.

Online services do not function. Multiplayer mode does not function outside of the offline training camp.
title: METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN

notes: The game runs but the save file gets corrupted after a couple of hours. It happened five times.
title: METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN

title: METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN

notes: This game has only 1 major issue that's preventing me to play any further. The save file corrupts every single time. After 40+ hours on Windows, it did not carry over my Cloud Save. Now on Linux, I was forced to start a new campaign and the same problem persists. Also, after 3 hours of gameplay, the sound starts to distort. Other than those 2 issues, the game runs perfect.
title: METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN

notes: needed to run the game in steam-runtime for the first time after that it can be run from steam-native
title: METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN

notes:
Perfomance is great, and I can get a smooth 60fps experience with this game. The only downside is that when changing settings the game's textures and lighting will flicker dramatically. 

Still Platinum because to me that's a non-issue.
title: METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN

notes: This one's funny, The game runs flawlessly but NO textures load in. All you will see is white, shaded atmosphere and enemies.
